casebody.data:
Hal PATTON, petitioner,
v.
ILLINOIS STATE BOARD OF ELECTIONS, etc., et al., respondents. LEAVE TO APPEAL DOCKET 123337 Supreme Court of Illinois. March 13, 2018

Emergency motion by Petitioner for expedited consideration of petition for leave to appeal. Allowed. The petition for leave to appeal is denied. Order entered by the Court

Emergency motion by Petitioner for stay of the Appellate Court's order of March 8, 2018, in case No. 1-18-0425, pending disposition of petition for leave to appeal. Denied Order entered by the Court
